subject: Football
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The performances of some N.F.L. replacement officials so far have not eased the concerns of players, coaches, fans, owners, oddmakers and anyone else who has a stake in the game.
snippet: The performances of some N.F.L. replacement officials so far have not eased the concerns of players, coaches, fans, owners, oddmakers and anyone else who has a stake in the game.
